sn55.46:1.1: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
sn55.46:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti—
sn55.46:2.3: itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavāti.
sn55.46:2.6: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgato hoti akhaṇḍehi …pe… samādhisaṁvattanikehi.
sn55.46:2.7: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato ariyasāvako sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo”ti.
